syntrial 0.3.7.9000

instantiate synthesis dataframe

Source: R/central.R
synth_df.Rd

instantiate synthesis dataframe

synth_df(USUBJID, n_new = 10, width = 3, maxweight = 2/3)

Arguments

USUBJID

character vector of person identifiers
n_new

number of new persons to generate, defaults to 10
width

number of persons from original trial to use for new person synthesis, defaults to 3
maxweight

maximum allowed weight for one person for synthesis of new person, defaults to 2/3

Value

dataframe relating new persons to source persons and their their contribution's weight

Examples

synth_df(USUBJID = letters)
#>    synid USUBJID     weight selected
#> 1      1       m 0.18033877    FALSE
#> 2      1       w 0.21689988    FALSE
#> 3      1       l 0.68016292     TRUE
#> 4      2       e 0.49884561     TRUE
